channel.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
channel.description:
Ok
So the First Thing Is :
I got a source and i want if they donate the get automaticly donation points on server
I Got Donation Points ready . but i cant do so if they donate they get it automaticly i got it only that i have to give them it via data->Characters->Name
Now
2: Model
I Got a dragon whip fully working only when i use it it gets bugged and glitched , i cant see my self when i use it . i need help plz
3.Mystery box . i got it but i want to add like items on it ehm like death cape i got the model and everything but how do i ad it on mystery box so it is like 10 % chance of getting it please help me i got some weapons there is in mystery box when they buy it is 10% chance of get items but i want help to add a item on it
PLEASE HELP ME I BEG U ADD ME - post under ur msn and i add u I NEED A CODER TOO PLEASE ADD ME

item.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

If this is a 317, for mystery box go to “items”.java, and scroll down until you see mysterybox “random” and add the id.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help

item.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

for the mystery box:

if you already have it’s model, then add this:

if(misc.random(10) == 1) { addItem(DeathCapeIDHere, 1); sM(you get a death cape!); sM(your mystery box dissapears mysteriously.); deleteItem(MysteryBoxIDHere, 1); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help

item.title: Help Me! - Donate Points - Model - Mystery Box Donating -Please Help
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

what hes trying to say is that the ints are messed up. They are located in the class8.java in your client, and right now hes saying that the ints are only reading the drop and inventory models, and it cant find the male and/or female model which u need to be able to see something that you’re wearing.

P.S might wanna take the request for a coder off. you have to make a development team and get it approved to be able to request coders.

Read full topic
